thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-HubSpot Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HubSpot Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.41
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - HubSpot Inc:
* HUBSPOT REPORTS Q1 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.41 * Q1 REVENUE $114.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $109.9 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.59 TO $0.65
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 TO $0.16
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $117 MILLION TO $118 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56, REVENUE VIEW $484.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $116.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
